subject: CGMs committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs-reg.
text: MRa 744 rTHNf geaz<ut (79v5 4Rde7 & RNTARf FARTY, 4RG TrR) National Highways Authority of India FFqya T (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 01l-5 & 6, #2r-10, ErqT, #6 @alt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3M/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Conciliation Committee/2024 Policy Circular No.2.1.73/ 2024 dated 03rd 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD / conciliation /2021-Part(1) (Comp. No. 67745)} Sub: 3 CGMs committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs-reg: Nos of 3-CGM committees were constituted vide NHAI Circular No. NHAI/CMD / Conciliation/2021-Part(1) (Comp: No. 67745) dated 18.11.2022 ,  Policy Circular No. 2.1.58/2023 dated 15.05.2023 and Policy Circular No. 2.1.65/2023 dated 04.12.2023 to expedite the disposal of pending cases. 2 Now, it has been decided that Sh. B.M Rao, CGM(F) and Sh: Ashish Kumar Singh, CGM(F) will replace Sh: Subhash Khurana, Ex-GM(F) [relieved from the post of General Manager (Finance) W.e.f 30.04.2024 upon attaining the age of superannuation] in Committee No. 2 and Committee No. 4 respectively for all ongoing and future cases of these committees till further orders. 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: "osjo-t2y (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1. Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3. Web Admin for circulation: 'M T U 9 NHAI May, Four Copy
